metadata.Title: CVE-2021-34434 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Eclipse Mosquitto versions 2.0 to 2.0.11, when using the dynamic security plugin, if the ability for a client to make subscriptions on a topic is revoked when a durable client is offline, then existing subscriptions for that client are not revoked.

criterions.comment: mosquitto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
